snippet: At Friday Prayer, clerics accused the United States of leading an economic war against Iran, and asserted that the currency crisis would ease.
abstract: Senior Iranian clerics accuses the United States of leading an economic war against Iran, asserting the currency crisis will ease; message comes as Western officials contemplate tightening sanctions even further.
lead_paragraph: At Friday Prayer, clerics accused the United States of leading an economic war against Iran, and asserted that the currency crisis would ease.

headline.seo: Iranian Leaders Defiant Even as Currency Falls
headline.main: Defiant Message Amid Iran Currency Crisis
headline.print_headline: Defiant Message Amid Iran Currency Crisis
